title: Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and Related Matters) Act 2019 (No. 43 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and 

Related Matters) Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited blasphemy (abolition offence related matters) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and Related Matters) Act 2019 (No. 43 of
heading: 2. The 17th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 17th day of January 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and Related Matters) Act 2019 (No. 43 of 
2019) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 January, 2020. 

CHARLES FLANAGAN, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [13] 3

title: Blasphemy (Abolition of Offences and Related Matters) Act 2019 (No. 43 of
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 17 January 2020 as the date on which the Blasphemy 
(Abolition of Offences and Related Matters) Act 2019 comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [13]
